titles.title: A bill to prohibit certain discharges of waste waters into the Pacific Ocean between Morro Bay and San Francisco Bay, California, including the bays and their environs, the San Joaquin River and the Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta and Estuary.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

term.name: Waste disposal in rivers, lakes, etc.

bill.summary: 5/13/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from discharging wastewaters from the Central Valley Project into the Pacific Ocean between Morro Bay and San Francisco Bay, California, including the bays and their environs, the San Joaquin River, and the Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta and Estuary.
